    G

    GAME_LOOP_TICK_MS - Static variable in class application.util.Config
    Game loop tick interval in milliseconds.
    GameAction - Interface in application.model.interfaces
    Represents an executable action that modifies the game board.
    GameController - Class in application.controller
    Central orchestrator that owns the game model and manages all threads.
    GameController() - Constructor for class application.controller.GameController
    Creates a new GameController in the GameState.MENU state with default values.
    GameState - Enum Class in application.model
    Represents the current state of the game, used by GameController and all worker threads to determine their behavior.
    GameView - Class in application.view
    The main in-game layout containing the Tetris grid, side panel, and boss info.
